name: Marketplace
eComp: Unlock a trade with the bank: 3R:1R
eVisitO: you may object to the trade

name: Housing
eVisitX: Take an additional Extra Action this turn OR take an Extra Action with no location restriction.
eVisitO: You may take a Build Action

name: Pendantmaker
eVisitX: You may pay 4 crystals to receive a spell component of any kind.

name: Hospital
eVisitO: you may move once towards a plains

name: Baths
eVisitO: you may dry or flood one tile

name: Aqueduct
eComp: change a plains into a resource tile, gather, then populate

name: Amphitheater
eVisitX: exchange one sigil with the bank

name: Sewers
eComp: add three sewer tiles below this tile and two adjacent tiles. +6 influence

name: Basilica
eComp: Adjust your alignment to whatever you want.
eVisitX: adjust sanity by 2. you may cast an additional spell this turn.
eVisitO: you may adjust your sanity by 1

name: Hippodrome
eComp: get +1 influence per layer from now on
eVisitO: +1  vote on objection during the duel
